types.name: Group
documentation: A group of individuals.
They do things together and can display some things and stuff.
Interesting.

types.name: User
documentation: A user is a system contact.
They are probably a real person, but might be a robot.
You never know these days.

members.name: mobile
documentation: A mobile phone number for the user.

members.name: fibreChannelPorts
members.documentation: List of all physical Fibre Channel ports.

types.name: FibreChannelPortInfo
documentation: Fibre Channel Node Port Info object returns information about all Fibre Channel ports on a node, or for one node in the cluster. The same information is returned for all ports or port information for one node. This information is returned with the API method ListNodeFibreChannelPortInfo (in the SolidFire API Guide).

members.name: firmware
members.documentation: The version of the firmware installed on the Fibre Channel port.

members.name: hbaPort
members.documentation: The ID of the individual HBA port.

members.name: model
members.documentation: Model of the HBA on the port.

members.name: pciSlot
members.documentation: Slot in which the pci card resides on the Fibre Channel node hardware.

members.name: serial
members.documentation: Serial number on the Fibre Channel port.

members.name: speed
members.documentation: Speed of the HBA on the port.

members.name: state
documentation: Possible values:

Unknown
NotPresent
Online
Offline
Blocked
Bypassed
Diagnostics
Linkdown
Error
Loopback
Deleted

members.name: switchWwn
members.documentation: The World Wide Name of the Fibre Channel switch port.

members.name: wwnn
members.documentation: World Wide Node Name of the HBA node.

members.name: wwpn
members.documentation: World Wide Port Name assigned to the physical port of the HBA.

methods.name: listUsers
documentation: List Users that have a username, given_name or surname that matches a given filter.

params.name: name_filter
documentation: String used for filtering the resulting list of users.
List of users.

methods.name: listGroups
documentation: List Groups that have a name or display_name that matches a given filter.

params.name: name_filter
documentation: String used for filtering the resulting list of groups.
List of groups.

methods.name: createUser
documentation: Create a new user account.

params.name: username
documentation: Unique username for the new user account.

params.name: given_name
documentation: First name.

params.name: surname
documentation: Last name.

params.name: mobile
documentation: Optional mobile number.

params.name: age
documentation: Optional age of the person behind the account.

methods.name: ListFibreChannelPortInfo
documentation: The ListFibreChannelPortInfo is used to return information about the Fibre Channel ports. The API method is intended for use on individual nodes; userid and password is required for access to individual Fibre Channel nodes. However, this method can be used on the cluster if the force=true parameter is included in the method call. When used on the cluster, all Fibre Channel interfaces are listed.
